attributes.additional_details:
We the people demmand a referendum on the EU before 2014 our boarders are opened  to yet more uncontrolled imigration. Also they are responsible for shutting down our capabillity to produce power, rising the price on us more.

I want the goverment to give the people a referendum before 2014, also to keep the coal powerstations open prices are already crippling we cant take it.
